- ✅ Smart inbox, team sharing, built-in scheduling
- ✅ Works on Mac, Windows, iOS, Android
- ✅ Has an **AI assistant**, or you can **copy-paste my drafts in easily**
- ✅ Supports Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo, iCloud, IMAP
